Getting Into the Vortex: The Law of Attraction in Action, Episode XII
Esther Hicks  (Actor),     Jerry Hicks  (Actor, Director)    Rated:    PG    Format: DVD-ROM  This title is manufactured on demand using DVD-R, when sold by Amazon.com.  Learn more   What's this?
Movies & TV, Genre for Featured Categories, Special Interests
['Product Description', '2-DVD set', "“You didn’t come to ‘get it done'. You came for the thrill of the ride.”", 'New questions on\xa0: staying positive around a negative friend, why bad things can happen when you’re feeling good, death\xa0- of\xa0- a\xa0- child issues, she’s lost her trust in men, why are we all here, do we ultimately pay for harming others? And – how to hear your own Inner Voice!', 'Plus: Abraham issues a call-out to society:\xa0 “To the leaders of your world, to the leaders of your organizations, to the doctors and scientists and psychologists and psychiatrists, to the teachers… to anyone who wants to help anyone…”\xa0– Abraham delivers!', 'About the Actor', 'All your power is in your Now. And what Now is the reason that Now is Now its whole power and potential is that Now is where you meet You. It is where the vibration of your current offering and the vibration of You, meet. And your emotions tell you how the meeting is going.\xa0 For tons of free material along with the latest books, CDs,\xa0and DVDs, visit their website.']

Great I loved it.

profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

This user continues to showcase a strong interest in self-help and personal development, particularly in the realms of positive thinking and the Law of Attraction. Their affinity for classic television series persists, providing a delightful blend of nostalgia and entertainment that reinforces their quest for joy and inspiration. 

The recent review reflects their deep appreciation for humor in classic shows, likening them to other beloved productions that cleverly critique societal norms. This enjoyment illustrates their preference for content that elicits positive emotions and cherished memories, highlighting a nostalgic yet critical engagement with classic media.

Additionally, the user's practice of rating content with thoughtful reflections demonstrates a commitment to quality and meaningful engagement, reinforcing their desire for both entertainment and insight. Their community-oriented approach to sharing resources aligns with their spiritual journey of personal growth, and their enjoyment of interactive, meditative experiences emphasizes their holistic view on emotional wellness.

Overall, they balance the pursuit of motivational and nostalgic content, showcasing a commitment to self-discovery, emotional well-being, and the fun of classic entertainment. This nuanced perspective enhances their fulfilling life experience, blending past joys with ongoing personal development.
